analyzed: no upādānam na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā pañca, vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: pañca vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nokilesaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanokilesaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no kilesam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na no kilesam na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava
